main event: Several observers reported seeing a bright light in the sky near Grants, New Mexico on 8 April 1964.
interesting points: The object was described as cigar-shaped or elliptical,The light was strong and pulsating, visible for approximately 15 seconds maximum during sightings,Observers noted abrupt changes in direction in the object's movement,One additional observer reported a loud noise when the object passed overhead.
witness description: One witness was a science teacher with aviation experience, and another was a garage mechanic who observed the object.
